course.title: Social Issues in Biology
course.faculty_text: Jonathan R. Beckwith (Medical School), and Louis Guenin (Medical School)
course.description: Discussion course on topics selected from the following: history, philosophy of science; evolution vs. creationism; genetics and race; women and science; genetic testing; science journalism; genetics and criminality; science in wartime; scientists and social responsibility; theater and the public presentation of science.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Medical School as MG 722.0. Alternates yearly between the Longwood and the Cambridge Campuses.
